videoData.title: Bring out your inner filmmaker

nodes.whoTheyAre: As director of multimedia experience in the SSgA Global Product and Marketing group, Mark Halliday is responsible for SSgA’s video marketing efforts, from production to technology. With experiences that inform his passion for innovative story telling with digital video, Halliday also works as a surveillance cinematographer in New York City, while writing and directing a feature film and coding movies at the MIT Media Lab that edit themselves on-the-fly.

videoData.description: Video is ubiquitous. Companies use it for entertainment, marketing, training – and customers generally expect it. Mark Halliday describes "Studio in a Box," a program he put together which allows State Street employees to make professional-quality videos of their own.
videoData.socialDescription: Video is ubiquitous. Companies use it for entertainment, marketing, training – and customers generally expect it. Mark Halliday describes "Studio in a Box," a program he put together which allows State Street employees to make professional-quality videos of their own.
